# navigatable interface

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/ai/navigatable
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:58:02.807574

---

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Fortnite.com/AI }` |

## Members

This interface has functions, but no data members.

### Functions

| Function Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`GetCurrentDestination`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/ai/navigatable/getcurrentdestination) | Return the current destination of the character |
| [`NavigateTo`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/ai/navigatable/navigateto) | Navigate toward the specified target |
| [`StopNavigation`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/ai/navigatable/stopnavigation) | Stop navigation |
| [`Wait`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/ai/navigatable/wait) | Wait for a specific duration |
| [`SetMovementSpeedMultiplier`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/ai/navigatable/setmovementspeedmultiplier) | Apply a multiplier on the movement speed (Multiplier is clamped between 0.5 and 2) |
